articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A number of Monday's newspapers have the latest on the ongoing war in Ukraine.
articles.title: Newspaper headlines: 'Europe in turmoil' and 'Happy ever Bafta'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Sir Keir Starmer said securing a lasting peace in Ukraine was "essential" to deter Vladimir Putin from future aggression.
articles.title: Starmer 'ready' to put UK troops on ground in Ukraine to protect peace

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Criminals pretending to be bailiffs are tricking people into paying thousands of pounds to settle fictitious debts.
articles.title: Scams: 'Fake bailiffs said they'd take my furniture'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Officers appear to have rejected every application from former Afghan commandos who fought alongside them.
articles.title: Special Forces blocked 2,000 credible asylum claims from Afghan commandos, MoD confirms

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The big winners talk of high spirits, heavy trophies and some speech advice they wish they hadn't taken.
articles.title: Baftas backstage: Eight highlights from the British film awards

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Kentucky has seen the worst effects of the rain thus far, reporting at least eight dead.
articles.title: At least 9 dead in US floods and heavy rain

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Stars including Cynthia Erivo, Demi Moore, Adrien Brody and Guy Pearce were in their finest outfits.
articles.title: Baftas red carpet in pictures: Stars turn on style at British film awards

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Sir Keir Starmer says the figure is a "shot in the arm", but "the job isn't done" to bring down waiting lists.
articles.title: Keir Starmer: Pledge of two million extra NHS appointments met

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Europe's hastily convened security summit in Paris is proof of leaders' anxiety about their role in defending Ukraine, the BBC's Katya Adler writes.
articles.title: Can Europe conjure a united front on Ukraine's future?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Pope drama and immigration epic win four apiece; there are also wins for Zoe Saldana and Mikey Madison.
articles.title: Conclave and The Brutalist win top prizes at Bafta film awards
